title: Crunchy walnut banana muffins
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '400g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '175ml milk', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '225g butter, melted and cooled', '2 bananas, mashed', '1 banana, chopped', '120g granola', '120g chopped walnuts', '75g desiccated coconut', '30g banana chips (optional)']
